display.title: Enchanter's Crucible
display.description: An Enchanter's Crucible Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, a stack of Blackstone, 4 Crying Obsidian, Amethyst Block & Soul Campfire onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 64x Blackstone 4x Crying Obsidian 1x Amethyst Block 1x Soul Campfire | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
